name: Tony Scott
description:
hello,
hi am tony by name i am from United State of American am new at this site am here looking for good and caring woman who will make me happy all the days of my life
i have said to my god that i will not love any more but my mom told me not to do that to my self,cause i can not wait to look for any other love and i also belive that womans are all the same,i have a kid which she named dorris she is 7 years old girl but is does not matter to me a friend of my give me this site that is where he saw her true love how i wish to also get my true love at this site i will be very happy i like travling me and my kid i love my kid alot i cant never do with out her so i was looking for who will get married to me and my kid onec again am (Tony)
greetings to you…………………………….
